name: General Psychiatry
metaDescription: Specialized administrative support for board-certified psychiatrists. We handle intake coordination, prior authorizations, and complex case management workflows.
heroDescription: Focus on clinical excellence. We handle the administrative demands of high-volume psychiatric practices.

resources.title: Optimizing Patient Intake
resources.description: Streamlining the new patient journey from initial inquiry to first appointment.

name: Women's Mental Health
metaDescription: Specialized support for reproductive psychiatry. Sensitive intake coordination for perinatal, postpartum, and menopausal mental health.
heroDescription: Concierge support for sensitive cases. We understand the nuances of reproductive psychiatry scheduling and patient privacy.

resources.title: Managing Reproductive Psychiatry Referrals
resources.description: Best practices for coordinating care with OB/GYNs and fertility specialists.

name: Child & Adolescent
metaTitle: Child Psychiatry Admin Support | Virtual Minds
metaDescription: Administrative support for child psychiatrists. Managing parent communications, school forms, and complex family scheduling.
heroDescription: We manage the family dynamic. From coordinating with parents to handling school forms, we support your young patients' ecosystem.

resources.title: Streamlining School Form Requests
resources.description: Efficient workflows for handling IEP documents and school medication authorizations.

name: Integrative Psychiatry
metaDescription: Support for holistic and integrative practices. Managing functional testing kits, supplement protocols, and extended appointment types.
heroDescription: Supporting whole-person care. We manage the logistics of functional testing and supplement coordination so you can treat the whole patient.

resources.title: Coordinating Functional Medicine Labs
resources.description: How we manage kit shipping and result tracking for integrative practices.

name: ADHD & Neuropsych
metaTitle: ADHD & Neuropsych Admin Support | Virtual Minds
metaDescription: Specialized support for ADHD and Neuropsychiatry. Managing testing schedules, controlled substance authorizations, and complex assessments.
heroDescription: Precision admin for precision medicine. We handle strict C2 authorization protocols and lengthy neuropsych testing blocks.

resources.title: Managing Stimulant Authorizations
resources.description: Proactive workflows for managing C2 refills and insurance requirements.

name: Practice Launch
metaTitle: Private Practice Launch Support | Virtual Minds
metaDescription: Launch your California private practice with confidence. Credentialing, EHR setup, and practice formation support for psychiatrists.
heroDescription: From hospital to private practice. We provide the operational infrastructure you need to launch your independent brand.

resources.title: Private Practice Checklist
resources.description: Essential steps for launching your psychiatric private practice in California.
